Pre-Game Insights: The West Indies squad has the edge on paper and is expected to perform well.
Despite a lacklustre performance in the 2022 edition, the Rovman Powell-led side poses a major threat this time around.
Papua New Guinea (PNG) is coming into the tournament strong with an outstanding record of 14 victories in their last 18 matches.
Under the dynamic leadership of Assad Vala, PNG will be making their second appearance at the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup.
The Windies, known for their flair and power-hitting, will look to start their campaign with a strong performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Providence Stadium in Guyana is expected to offer equal assistance to both the batters and the bowlers.
A temperature of around 28°C, with high chances of rain, is forecast.
Top players for the fantasy team include Andre Russell, Rovman Powell, and Tony Ura.
